name: For Great Honor
tooltip:
For Great HonorLevel 60

Many brave fighters look up to you, <name>.  You continue to be an example for all in the fight against the Alliance.  What news do you bring from your journeys?

Requirements:
- Alterac Valley Mark of Honor x 3
- Arathi Basin Mark of Honor x 3
- Warsong Gulch Mark of Honor x 3
